the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks. "With everything going on, I wanted to play well," Allen Iverson said. I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here. Allen Iverson was benched by Pistons coach Michael Beasley Curry to begin the game, punishment for missing a mandatory team practice on Thanksgiving. The saga of the "American Idol" phenomenon, from its origins in the 2001 hit British series "Pop Idol" right up to Simon Cowell 's departure, is the focus of Richard Rushfield's breezy, gossipy American Idol: The Untold Story. Currently an entertainment columnist for the website the Daily Beast and a Vanity Fair contributing editor, Simon Cowell Rushfield blogged about "American Idol" for three years for the Los Angeles Times and clearly knows his subject well.

Eric Schmidt said that he would focus on external issues, such as "deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships," while Page would merge Google's technology and business vision.
